channel.title: Reseting stats?
channel.description:
any1 know how to form a structure of this command??
to reset some1 elses stats.

item.title: Reseting stats?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“reset”)) {

try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

p.addSkillXP(-14000000, i);
p.disconnected = true;
sM(“You have reset “+p.playerName+”!”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to reset”);
}
}[/code]
